issue.title: Error: `traindir/likelihood/likelihood.0.ll` and `traindir/likelihood/likelihood.0.ll` are the same file

content.raw: ```set_log_likelihood_filenames``` will be called for cases not only ```instance_index == 0```. The only thing is that for the final result file it has always been 0. There are other places where they call ```set_log_likelihood_filenames``` which generate filenames such like ```likelihood.9.ll``` for instance 9 but none of them will be used as a final result file.
content.html: set_log_likelihood_filenames will be called for cases not only instance_index == 0. The only thing is that for the final result file it has always been 0. There are other places where they call set_log_likelihood_filenames which generate filenames such like likelihood.9.ll for instance 9 but none of them will be used as a final result file.
